message: Congratulations on considering my product! With over 10% of my products sold being high-quality, I'm confident that this one is a gem. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item at a fixed price of $100. I'm not willing to negotiate, but I assure you that this product will exceed your expectations. Will you take the chance and make a purchase?
I trust the statistics and your confidence. I believe in taking chances on unique opportunities. Thank you for the assurance, Alice.

Thank you for the opportunity, Alice. I trust your selection process and am willing to pay $100 for the product based on your recommendation and past sales statistics.
